TopicTitle: Is There a Good Orion/SLS 1.1.2 Pack Out There?

Articles.Content:
I used to use Bobcat's American Pack back in the day... but it seems that it got forgotten about. Most of his mods were damned awesome.

But now I've got the urge to fly the Orion again and I cannot find a good one that is compatible with 1.0.5 let alone 1.1.2. Can anyone point me in the right direction please. Thanks.

well, for stock looks, i like Sobol's Space Launch System Parts pack

for RO/RSS the best one is probably SSTU labs, as it adds SLS parts as well as others so you can build Saturn V, Ares rockets, etc.

There is also the Spice lauch system parts pack for RO/RSS with less parts. The pack focuses on the block 1B config

HOLY *BLEEEP*. Thanks for the heads up LGTM. I can't believe I missed out on these mods... The SSTU parts look really nice. Thank god for 64bit that at least lets you load more stuff. Missing out on the Procedural Parts atm as I usually use that for making all my tanks (saves having multiple tanks that are almost identical). I probably missed out on the other mods because I use PP.
